channel.title: My Runescape Stat Signatures
channel.description:
Link: http://www.chris61.homeip.net/All/scripts/Runescape_Stuff/Dynamic_All_Stats/
Sometimes it wont work if it has spaces but it might so just try it their if it dont allow spaces just go to this link:
http://www.chris61.homeip.net/All/scripts/Runescape_Stuff/Dynamic_All_Stats/?rsn=RSNAMEHERE
and put your name where it says rsnamehere
Site might go off dont panic its hosting from my pc. So it will go off when im going to bed sorry
Good Luck. Enjoy. Rate.

item.title: My Runescape Stat Signatures
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Your thing makes pics for all the users LOL! you’r dumb…
and I don’t think you made because alot of people don’t put comments.

[code]

<?php function get_hiscores($player) { $skills = array('overall','attack','defence','strength','hitpoints','ranged','prayer','magic','cooking','woodcutting','fletching','fishing','firemaking','crafting','smithing','mining','herblore','agility','thieving','slayer','farming','runecraft','hunter','construction','summoning'); if(!$player) { return false; } // Grab the data from hiscore.runescape.com $data_source = @file_get_contents('http://hiscore.runescape.com/index_lite.ws?player='.$player); // Make sure we actually found some data if(!$data_source) { die("Non-existant or unranked player"); } // Create our initial array $src_stats = explode("\n", $data_source); // Let's make that array a bit easier to use. for($i=0; $i<count($skills); $i++) { $data = explode(',',$src_stats[$i]); $stat['r'] = $data[0]; $stat['l'] = $data[1]; $stat['x'] = $data[2]; $stats[$skills[$i]] = $stat; } return $stats; } if($_GET['rsn'] != NULL) { // Form is submitted, lets do something: $rsn = $_GET['rsn']; // Replace underscores with spaces, so we know what we're dealing with. $rsn = str_replace("_", " ", $rsn); $rsn = str_replace("-1", " ", $rsn); // Retrieve the hiscores. $stats = get_hiscores($rsn); // Create the image. $im = @imagecreatefrompng('images/sig_backgrounds/1.png'); // These are the stats I chose to include (I can only fit some of them) $show = array("attack", "strength", "defence", "hitpoints", "prayer", "ranged", "magic", "summoning", "slayer", "mining", "smithing", "herblore", "farming", "crafting", "fishing", "woodcutting", "firemaking", "cooking"); // Create a loop, adding each icon to the "grid" $row = 0; for($i=0; $i<count($show); $i++) { // Create a second image, from the icon. $icon = @imagecreatefrompng('images/rsicons/'.$show[$i].'.png'); if(is_int($i/6)) { $row++; } // What coordinates do we want to paste them at? $x_coord = (6+$i-($row*6))*47+10; // Space each icon by 40px; shift the entire row over 10px $y_coord = ($row-1)*35+20; // Space each row by 25px; shift the entire grid down by 10px imagecopy($im, $icon, $x_coord, $y_coord, 0, 0, imagesx($icon), imagesy($icon)); // Get rid of the icon image, free up some memory. imagedestroy($icon); } // Create a loop, adding each stat to the "grid" $row = 0; for($i=0; $i<count($show); $i++) { // Add the text. if(is_int($i/6)) { $row++; } // What coordinates do we want to paste it at? $x_coord = (6+$i-($row*6))*47+36; // Space each stat by 40px; shift the entire row over 36px $y_coord = ($row-1)*35+15+20; // Space each row by 25px; shift the entire grid down by 10px + 15px for the font. // Lets choose a color for the text... how about black? (0,0,0 for RGB) $color = imagecolorallocate($im, 0, 0, 0); imagettftext($im, 10, 0, $x_coord, $y_coord, $color, "verdana.ttf", $stats[$show[$i]]['l']); } // Let's add the user's name imagettftext($im, 10, 0, 10, 130, $color, "verdana.ttf", $rsn); // And the total level $bounds = imagettfbbox(10, 0, "verdana.ttf", "Total: ".$stats['overall']['l']); $text_width = $bounds[2]-$bounds[0]; imagettftext($im, 10, 0, imagesx($im)-$text_width-10, 130, $color, "verdana.ttf", "Total: ".$stats['overall']['l']); // Choose a place to save it, and then save it! $save_to = 'images/users/'.$rsn.'.png'; imagepng($im, $save_to); // Show them a nice message on completion. $style = "border: 1px solid #656565; background: #FFFFFF; color: #656565; font-family: verdana; width: 500px; height: 22px;"; die('

Signature created/updated succesfully!




Direct Link:
Forum Link:
Forum Link 2:
Update Link:

		<input type="text" readonly="readonly" style="<?=$style?>" value="[img]'.$save_to.'[/img]"></input><br />
		<input type="text" readonly="readonly" style="<?=$style?>" value="[IMG]'.$save_to.'[IMG]"></input><br />
		<input type="text" readonly="readonly" style="<?=$style?>" value="'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'].$_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'].'"></input><br />
	</div>
	<br />
	<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" />Make another sig!</a>
');

}
?>

Dynamic Signatures By Chris Enter your RuneScape username to get started! [/code]

Read full topic
